title: The 7 Most Comfortable Sofas You Can Buy Today
sub_head: Interior designers purchase couches for themselves and hard-to-please clients. We asked them: Which sofas are the absolute cushiest?
body:
AS WE resume our winter binge-watching schedule, an accommodating couch becomes even more key. To give priority to plushiness, we asked scores of designers to name the comfiest sofas on the market today, which we narrowed to these seven.
A truly comfortable couch needn’t sacrifice elegance. DePadova’s Square 16 sofa (shown above), rectilinear and standing on sleek steel legs, is nonetheless hospitable. Cloudlike goose down and polyurethane foam fill its upholstery, including the armrest cushions. “This sofa is one of my favorite go-tos as it’s extremely comfortable and practical yet sophisticated, elevating any space,” said interior designer Susan Taylor, of Davis Taylor Design in Los Angeles. Here, six more soothing sofas beloved by designers.
